News_Titles: Bagrat Khutaba met with the Ambassador of the Sultanate of Oman to Syria
News_Shorts: Bagrat Khutaba, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to Syria met with Turki Ben Mahmoud al-Busaidi, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Sultanate of Oman to Syria at the Embassy of the Republic of Abkhazia in the Syrian Arab Republic on April 25, 2021.

News_Titles: Bagrat Khutaba met with the Ambassador of Yemen to Syria
News_Shorts: The official meeting of Bagrat Khutaba, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Syrian Arab Republic with Abdullah Ali Sabri, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Islamic Republic of Yemen took place in the city of Damascus at the Embassy of the Islamic Republic of Yemen in the Syrian Arab Republic on March 15, 2021.

News_Titles: Zaur Gvadjava participated in a video conference of heads of diplomatic missions accredited in Venezuela
News_Shorts: On February 9, 2021, Zaur Gvadjava, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, at the invitation of the Nuncio of the Pope, Dean of the Diplomatic Corps, His Holiness Aldo Giordano, participated in a video conference of heads of diplomatic missions accredited in the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela.

News_Titles: Press release on the 28th anniversary of the signing of the Treaty of Friendship and Cooperation between the Republic of Abkhazia and the Transnistrian Moldovan Republic
News_Shorts: On January 22, 1993 the Treaty of Friendship and Cooperation between the Republic of Abkhazia and the Transnistrian Moldovan Republic was signed. This document laid the foundation for the establishment of interstate cooperation, laying the necessary foundation for the development and strengthening of bilateral cooperation between our countries.

News_Titles: Elections to the National Assembly were held in Venezuela
News_Shorts: On December 6, elections to the National Assembly were held in Venezuela. According to preliminary data from the National Electoral Council of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, the "Great Patriotic Pole", led by the United Socialist Party of Venezuela (PSPV), won, gaining a majority of seats in parliament. The results of the vote, which took place in accordance with the national legislation of Venezuela, were recognized by the head of state, Nicolas Maduro.

News_Titles: Zaur Gwajava took part in a meeting with Indira Alfonso, the Chairperson of the National Electoral Council and Jorge Arreas, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Venezuela.
News_Shorts: On December 1, at the Center for Strategic Operations of the National Electoral Council in the city of Caracas, Z.K. Gwajava, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela took part in a meeting with Indira Alfonso, the President of the National Electoral Council and Jorge Arreas, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Venezuela.

News_Titles: On the meeting with Hussein Arnous, the Chairman of the Council of Ministers
News_Shorts: The meeting of Bagrat Khutaba, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Syrian Arab Republic with Hussein Arnous, the Chairman of the Council of Ministers of Syria took place in the building of the Syrian Council of Ministers on November 23, 2020 in Damascus.

News_Titles: Daur Kove will take part in an international conference in Syria
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia will take part in an international conference dedicated to the process of the return of the Syrian refugees at the invitation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates of the Syrian Arab Republic. The conference will take place from 11 to 12 November 2020 in Damascus.

News_Titles: Delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia arrived in Damascus
News_Shorts: The delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia, headed by the Head of the Presidential Administration of the Republic of Abkhazia Alkhas Kvitsinia, arrived in Damascus on the evening of October 4.

News_Titles: Zaur Gvadzhava attended an international video press conference with Nicolas Maduro Moros, the President of Venezuela
News_Shorts: Z.K. Gvadzhava, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela took part in an international video press conference with the Nicolas Maduro Moros, the President of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela on May 6, 2020 at the invitation of the Foreign Ministry of Venezuela.

News_Titles: On the commemorative event dedicated to V.G. Ardzinba in the Representative Office of Abkhazia in the PMR
News_Shorts: The commemorative event dedicated to Vladislav Grigoryevich Ardzinba, the First President of the Republic of Abkhazia as well as the opening of the photo exhibition “75 Moments from the Life of the Great Son of Abkhazia” was held in the Official Representation of the Republic of Abkhazia in the PMR, today, on March 4, 2020.

News_Titles: On the meeting at the office of the «Vatan» party in Turkey
News_Shorts: The meeting was held between the representatives of the Plenipotentiary Representation of the Republic of Abkhazia in the Republic of Turkey and A. Logua, N. Smyr, V. Bebia, the Deputies of the People's Assembly-Parliament of the Republic of Abkhazia with Dogu Perenchek, the Chairman of the «Vatan» party in the office of the «Vatan» party, in the city of Istanbul, on February 26,2020.

News_Titles: MFA of Abkhazia repotrs
News_Shorts: In connection with the increase of the number of patients with coronavirus infection (COVID-19) in a number of countries, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia urges citizens of the Republic to refrain from visiting countries in which cases of infection have been recorded.

News_Titles: On the meeting with the Chairman of the Supreme Council of the PMR
News_Shorts: The working meeting between Alexander Korshunov, the Chairman of the Supreme Council of the PMR with Alexander Vataman, the Plenipotentiary Representative of the Republic of Abkhazia in the PMR and Vitaly Yankovsky, the Head of the Official Representation of the Republic of South Ossetia in the PMR was held today.

News_Titles: Khibla Amichba took part in the conference "International Urban Mobility Dialogue"
News_Shorts: The international conference "International Urban Mobility Dialogue" ended last week in Berlin. It was organized by Academus Berlin GmbH and brought together the representatives of administrations of different cities of the world as well as business, scientific communities and civic associations.

News_Titles: On the meeting at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the PMR
News_Shorts: The meeting between Vitaliy Ignatiev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic and Alexander Vataman, the Plenipotentiary Representative of the Republic of Abkhazia in the PMR was held at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the PMR on November 14, 2019. The meeting was attended by Alexander Stetsyuk, the Deputy Minister.

News_Titles: Meeting at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Russia
News_Shorts: Andrey Rudenko, the Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation held a meeting with Igor Akhba, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Russian Federation.

News_Titles: Alexander Vataman took part in official events on the occasion of the 29-th anniversary of the establishment of the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic
News_Shorts: The ceremonial events were held in the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic on September 2, 2019 on the occasion of the 29-th anniversary of the establishment of the PMR.

News_Titles: Zaur Gvadzhava arrived in the Republic of Nicaragua with a working visit
News_Shorts: Zaur Gvadzhava, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela arrived in the Republic of Nicaragua with a working visit on March 31,2019.

News_Titles: Vito Grittani had the meeting with Juan Rodriguez Díaz, the Venezuelan Ambassador to Italy
News_Shorts: Vito Grittani, the Ambassador-at-large of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia had the meeting with Juan Rodriguez Díaz, the Ambassador of Venezuela to Italy at the Embassy of Venezuela in Italy on March 8,2019.

News_Titles: The tourist exhibition "Mitt" was opened in Moscow
News_Shorts:
Igor Akhba, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Russian Federation and Avtandil Gartskiya, the Minister of Tourism visited the pavilion "Abkhazia" of the international tourist exhibition Mitt opened at the Expo Center at Krasnopresnenskaya Embankment.
Igor Akhba, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Russian Federation and Avtandil Gartskiya, the Minister of Tourism visited the pavilion "Abkhazia" of the international tourist exhibition Mitt opened at the Expo Center at Krasnopresnenskaya Embankment.

News_Titles: Igor Akhba awarded the Order of Friendship of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Igor Akhba, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia in the Russian Federation was awarded a high state award - the Order of Friendship by the Decree of Anatoly Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Pridnestrovie was visited by Vito Grittani, the Ambassador at large of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia
News_Shorts: Vito Grittani comes from Italy from the city of Bari. For a long time, he lived in Germany, and now he is a citizen of Abkhazia. Since his appointment in August 2016 as ambassador-at-large of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia in Italy he has been conducting competent and painstaking diplomatic work, providing all possible humanitarian assistance.

News_Titles: Zaur Gvadzhava held a meeting with Jaoska Calderon, the Ambassador of the Republic of Nicaragua in Venezuela
News_Shorts: Zaur Guadzhava, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela met with Jaoska Calderon, the Ambassador of the Republic of Nicaragua to the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela on February 27, 2019.

News_Titles: Vito Grittani met with Husam Yeddin Ala, the Permanent Representative of Syria to the UN in Geneva
News_Shorts: Vito Grittani, the ambassador-at-large of the Foreign Ministry of Abkhazia met with Hussam Yeddin Ala,the Permanent Representative of Syria to the United Nations in Geneva on February 13,2019.

News_Titles: Alexander Vataman spoke on the cooperation of Abkhazia and Transdniestria in 2018
The finalists of the children's drawing contest “Abkhazia, South Ossetia and Transdniestria: friendship, sealed by time” were awarded in Tiraspol
News_Shorts: Today, in the State Administration of the city of Tiraspol, young Tiraspol citizens were honored - the finalists of the children's international drawing contest “Abkhazia, South Ossetia and Transdniestria: friendship, sealed by time”.

News_Titles: Children's New Year's holiday was held at the Embassy of Abkhazia in Moscow
News_Shorts: In Moscow, the New Year carnival for children was organized by the Embassy of the Republic of Abkhazia in the Russian Federation and the Moscow Abkhaz diaspora.

News_Titles: Igor Akhba took part in an international conference in Moscow
News_Shorts: Igor Akhb, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Russian Federation, Ilya Guniya, Raul Lolua and Valery Agrba the deputies of the National Assembly as part of the Abkhaz delegation participated in the international conference “The Role of Parliaments in the Modern World”. The conference was dedicated to the 25-th anniversary of the Council of Federation of the Federal Assembly of the Russian Federation.

News_Titles: Igor Akhba took part in the meeting at «Skolkovo»
News_Shorts: An introductory meeting of the heads of the diplomatic corps accredited in Russia with the leadership of the Skolkovo Foundation was held in the Technopark of the Skolkovo Innovation Center.

News_Titles: Tenth anniversary of the establishment of the first Embassy of the Republic of Abkhazia
News_Shorts: The first Embassy of the Republic of Abkhazia was created ten years ago. The Embassy of the Republic of Abkhazia in the Russian Federation was established by the Decree of Sergey Bagapsh the President of the country on November 13, 2008.

News_Titles: An article «Abkhazia is a country of sports” was published in the state sports newspaper of Venezuela EL LIDER
News_Shorts: The article “Abkhazia is a country of sports” was published in the state sports newspaper of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela EL LIDER (El Leader) on November 12, 2018.

News_Titles: The Humanitarian action supported by the German diaspora
News_Shorts: The action of humanitarian aid to Abkhazia was launched among the Turkish Abkhaz diaspora. The diaspora living in different cities of Germany joined it.

News_Titles: An article on the 25-th anniversary of the Victory and Independence Day of the Republic of Abkhazia has been published in the Venezuelan state newspaper Ultimas Noticias
News_Shorts:
It is said:
25 years from the Victory Day in the Patriotic War of the People of Abkhazia.
This year, one of the most important holidays in the history of the Abkhaz state took place on September 30, the people of Abkhazia celebrated the 25-th anniversary of Victory Day in the Patriotic War of the People of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: Abkhaz-Russian consultations were held at the Russian Foreign Ministry
News_Shorts: The regular consultations took place in Moscow within the framework of the foreign policy coordination mechanism established by the Memorandum between the Foreign Ministry of Abkhazia and the Russian Foreign Ministry of March 11, 2015.

News_Titles: The attempts of the Republic of Moldova to limit the diverse of international contacts of Transdniestria indicate the preservation of the destructive approaches of the Moldovan side
News_Shorts: Border Police denied entry into the territory of the Republic of Moldova for Ruslan Ladaria, the head of the Administration of the Gudauta region of the Republic of Abkhazia who was to Transdniestria by transit way for celebrating the Day of the city of Dubossary on October 23, 2018. The entry was also denied for Garry Kupalba, the Head of the Official Representation of the PMR in the Republic of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: Zaur Gvadzhava made a reception on the occasion of the 25-th anniversary of Victory Day and the 10-th anniversary of the recognition of Abkhazia by the Russian Federation
News_Shorts:
Zaur Gvadzhava, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia made a reception on the occasion of the 25-th anniversary of Victory Day, the 10-th anniversary of the recognition of Abkhazia by the Russian Federation and the day of the armed forces of the Republic of Abkhazia on October 18, 2018.
Reception was held at the hotel Gran Melia Caracas.

News_Titles: Khibla Amichba took part in the conference "The severity of history - regional conflicts and the Legality in Eastern Europe"
News_Shorts: The conference entitled “The Severity of History — Regional Conflicts and Legality in Eastern Europe” was held in Berlin, organized by the Center for Eastern European and International Studies, Herder Institute and Leibniz Institute on October 17,2018.

News_Titles: Events dedicated to the Day of Victory and Independence of the Republic of Abkhazia will be held in Tiraspol
News_Shorts: On the eve of the holiday, on a big screen in the center of Tiraspol, a video in connection with the events in Abkhazia 25 years ago and Victory Day of the People of Abkhazia in the Patriotic War in 1992-1993 is broadcast in a repeating mode.

News_Titles: The Embassy of the Republic of Abkhazia in Venezuela continues to receive condolences on the occasion of the tragic death of Gennady Gagulia, the Prime Minister of Abkhazia
News_Shorts:
Yaoska Calderón, the Ambassador of the Republic of Nicaragua to the Bolivarian Republic of
Venezuela visited the Embassy of the Republic of Abkhazia in the Bolivarian Republic of
Venezuela on September 10, 2018 to express her condolences to Zaur Gvadzhava, the
Ambassador of the Republic of Abkhazia on the occasion of the tragic death of Gennady
Gagulia, the Prime Minister of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: Daur Kove sent a congratulatory note to Masis Mailyan on the occasion of the Independence Day of the Republic of Artsakh
News_Shorts: The Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia, Daur Kove sent a congratulatory note to Masis Mailyan, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Artsakh on the occasion of the Independence Day of the Republic of Artsakh.

News_Titles: Daur Cove congratulated Vitaly Ignatiev on the 28th anniversary of the Day of Formation of the Tansdniesrian Moldavian Republic
News_Shorts: In the congratulation, in particular, it is noted:

News_Titles: Alexander Vataman took part in a solemn meeting in honor of the 28th anniversary of the foundation of Transdniestria
News_Shorts: Traditionally, on the eve of the PMR Foundation Day, the Palace of the Republic accepts the top officials of the state, heads of ministries and departments, public figures, clergy, those who stood at its sources, and then defended its independence. Among the participants of the solemn meeting there were guests from Russia, heads of official representations of Abkhazia and South Ossetia in Transdniestria.

News_Titles: The International award "FELICORPSDIPLOMATIC" was presented to Zaur Gvadzhava
News_Shorts: The solemn ceremony of awarding the International award "FELICORPSDIPLOMATIC" to Zaur Gvadzhava, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela was held in the Embassy of the Republic of Abkhazia in the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela on August 2, 2018.

News_Titles: The Day of the Abkhaz flag was celebrated in Moscow
News_Shorts: The Embassy of the Republic of Abkhazia in the Russian Federation celebrated the Day of the National Flag.

News_Titles: The Reconstruction of "Abkhazia" pavilion at the Exhibition of the Economic Achievements
News_Shorts: The works on restoring of the historical appearance of the exhibition center are under way - the famous fountains and pavilions are being restored on the territory of the Exhibition of Economic Achievements.

News_Titles: Zaur Gvadzhava held a meeting with Salvador Victor Chirinos, the representative of the Che Guevara Foundation and the Commission for Solidarity with the People
News_Shorts: The meeting of Zaur Gvadzhava, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela with Salvador Victor Chirinos, the representative of the Che Guevara Foundation and the Commission for Solidarity with the People was held in the Embassy of the Republic of Abkhazia in Venezuela on June 27, 2018.

News_Titles: Alan Elbakiev took part in the farewell ceremony with Oleg Mamiev, the battalion commander of "Pyatnashki" which was held in Vladikavkaz
News_Shorts: Alan Elbakiev, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Republic of South Ossetia took part in the farewell ceremony with Oleg Mamiev, the battalion commander Pyatnashki which was held in Vladikavkaz.

News_Titles: Zaur Gvajawa held a meeting with Joseph Noxie, the Ambassador of South Africa in Venezuela
News_Shorts: On May 15, Zaur Gvajava, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela met with Joseph Knoxie, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of South Africa to the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela at the Embassy of Abkhazia in Venezuela.

News_Titles: Igor Akhba attended the inauguration ceremony of the Russian President in Kremlin.
News_Shorts: The inauguration ceremony of Vladimir Putin, the Russian President was at the Andreevsky Hall of the Grand Kremlin Palace in Moscow.

News_Titles: Igor Akhba met with the new Russian Ambassador to Abkhazia
News_Shorts: Alexei Dvinyanin, the new Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation to the Republic of Abkhazia visited the Embassy of the Republic of Abkhazia in Moscow.

News_Titles: Zaur Gvadzhava held a meeting with Macario Sandoval, the Deputy of the National Constituent Assembly of Venezuela
News_Shorts: The meeting of Zaur Gvadzhava, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Abkhazia to Venezuela with Macario Sandoval, the Deputy of the National Constituent Assembly of Venezuela was in the Embassy of the Republic of Abkhazia in the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela on April 5.

News_Titles: Zaur Gwadzhava held a meeting with Vladimir Zaemsky, the Ambassador of Russia in Venezuela
News_Shorts: The meeting of Zaur Gvadzhava, the Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary Ambassador of Abkhazia in Venezuela with Vladimir Zayemsky, the Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary Ambassador of Russia in Venezuela was on April 4 in the Embassy of the Russian Federation in the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela.

News_Titles: Hibla Amichba took part in the events dedicated to the 100-th anniversary of the formation of the Soviet Army
News_Shorts: The ceremony of laying flowers were held at the Monumental Complex to the Soviet soldiers at the Reichstag on the occasion of the 100-th anniversary of the formation of the Soviet Army on February 23 in Berlin.

News_Titles: Adik Arshba took part in the meeting with the representatives of the authorities of the Rostov region.
News_Shorts: The meeting of the representatives of the authorities of the Rostov region with the heads of the diplomatic missions accredited in the Rostov region was held in Rostov-on-Don. Adik Arshba, the Honorary Consul of the Republic of Abkhazia in Rostov-on-Don took part in the meeting at the invitation of the authorities of the region.

News_Titles: The meeting of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the PMR and the Plenipotentiary Representative of the Republic of Abkhazia in PMR was held at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the PMR.
News_Shorts: At the beginning of the meeting, Vitaly Ignatiev, the PMR Foreign Minister and Alexander Vataman, the Plenipotentiary Representative of the Republic of Abkhazia in PMR exchanged congratulations on the occasion of the 25-th anniversary of the signing of the Treaty on Friendship and Cooperation between the Republic of Abkhazia and the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic of 1993, which served as the basis for the formation of the present relations between Abkhazia and Pridnestrovie.

News_Titles: Zaur Gwadzhava participated in the plenary meeting of the heads of the diplomatic missions.
News_Shorts: Zaur Gwadzhava, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia at the invitation of the Papal Nuncio Aldo Giordano (Aldo Giordano) took part in a plenary meeting of the heads of diplomatic missions accredited in the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, which was held at the Vatican Embassy on October 23, 2017.

News_Titles: On the meeting of the Plenipotentiary Representative of the Republic of Abkhazia in Pridnestrovie with the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the PMR
News_Shorts: The working meeting between Vitaly Ignatiev, the Minister for Foreign Affairs of the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic and Alexander Vataman, the Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia in Pridnestrovie was held at the Ministry for Foreign Affairs of the PMR on October 4.

News_Titles: The Plenipotentiary Representative of the Republic of Abkhazia in PMR spoke at the International Scientific and Expert Round Table.
News_Shorts: The Institute for Socio-Political Research and Regional Development (Tiraspol) conducted the International Scientific and Expert Round Table "The Phenomenon of Russian Peacekeeping on the Dniester: 25 Years of Peace and Stability in the Epicenter of Geopolitical Transformations".

News_Titles: The Plenipotentiary Representative of Abkhazia in Pridnestrovie took part in the meeting "Memory of the Heart" at the memorial of the Military Glory in Tiraspol
News_Shorts: The decision of the Pridnestrovian leadership to declare the 1st of August as the Day of Remembrance and Grief for the gone defenders of the PMR is dated 1994. Since then, annually on this day in the Republic events are held reminding of the cessation of bloodshed on the Pridnestrovian land.

News_Titles: Alexander Vataman, the Plenipotentiary Representative of the Republic of Abkhazia in PMR took part in the ceremonial events in Bender dedicated to the 25th anniversary of the introduction of the Joint Peacekeeping Forces into the Security Zone of the Mold
News_Shorts: Alexander Vataman laid flowers to the memorial sign "Blessed are the peacemakers" to the slabs of the Memorial of Memory and Sorrow and to the monument to Lieutenant-General Lebed.

News_Titles: The meeting in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela
News_Shorts: Zaur Gvadzhava, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia participated in the meeting with Samuel Moncada, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela on July 26, 2017.

News_Titles: Khibla Amichba participated in the work of two conferences in Berlin
News_Shorts: Two conferences were held in Berlin: the first - "Eurasian Economic Union and its importance for Armenia, Belarus and Kazakhstan" (organized by the German Society for the Study of Eastern Europe and the Friedrich Naumann Foundation) was held on June 27.

News_Titles: The meeting of Adika Arshba, the Honorary Consul of the Republic of Abkhazia with the Mayor of Rostov in the Rostov region
News_Shorts: The first meeting of Adik Arshba , the Honorary Consul of the Republic of Abkhazia was held with Vitaliy Kushnaryov, the Head of Rostov-on-Don Administration in Rostov-on-Don.

News_Titles: The Embassy of the Republic of South Ossetia in Abkhazia hosted a meeting between Oleg Arshba and Oleg Botsiev
News_Shorts:
Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Oleg Arshba held a meeting with Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of South Ossetia to the Republic of Abkhazia Oleg Botsiev. The meeting was also attended by Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Giorgi Dumava.

At the beginning of the meeting, Oleg Arshba introduced the Assistant to the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Giorgi Dumava to the Ambassador.

During the conversation, the sides exchanged views on cooperation and strengthening of ties between the two republics. Other issues of mutual interest were also discussed at the meeting.

News_Titles: Daur Kove congratulated the staff of the Foreign Ministry and all the staff of the Embassies and Foreign Embassies
News_Shorts: Daur Kove congratulated the staff of the Foreign Ministry and all the staff of the Embassies and Foreign Embassies of the Republic of Abkhazia on the 24th anniversary of the establishment of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: Celebrating Victory Day in Berlin
News_Shorts: Festive events dedicated to the Victory Day in the Great Patriotic War were held in Berlin. They began on May 7 with a grand concert of the Turkish Choir and were continued today. Several thousand people took part in the official ceremony of laying flowers to the Soviet memorial in Treptow Park on the Victory Day.

News_Titles: Meeting of the Ambassador with the Honorary Consul of the Republic of Abkhazia in Rostov-on-Don
News_Shorts: Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Russian Federation Igor Akhba received Adik Arshba, appointed Honorary Consul of the Republic of Abkhazia in Rostov-on-Don.

News_Titles: Igor Akhba met with students from Abkhazia studying at MGIMO
News_Shorts: The Embassy of the Republic of Abkhazia in Russia hosted a regular meeting of the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to Russia Igor Akhba with students from Abkhazia studying in Moscow universities. Such meetings have already become traditional.

News_Titles: Igor Akhba congratulated Alexey Gogua on his 85th birthday
News_Shorts: Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Russian Federation Igor Akhba sent his congratulations to the writer Alexey Gogua on the occasion of his 85th anniversary.

News_Titles: Abkhazian Ambassador to Russia Igor Akhba paid tribute to the memory of Vitaly Churkin
News_Shorts: Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Russian Federation Igor Akhba visited the Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

News_Titles: Igor Akhba received charge d'affaire of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela in the Russian Federation, Jose Gregorio Escalona
News_Shorts: Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Russian Federation Igor Akhba received charge d'affaire of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela in the Russian Federation, Jose Gregorio Escalona.

News_Titles: Igor Akhba congratulated Alexander Orlov-Kretchmer on his 70th birthday
News_Shorts: Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Russian Federation Igor Akhba extended congratulations to Dr. of Social Sciences, Professor Alexander Orlov-Kretchmer on the occasion of his 70th anniversary.

News_Titles: Plenipotentiary Representative of the Republic of Abkhazia in Bulgaria and the Balkan countries Omer Marchand congratulated Daur Kove on his appointment as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia
News_Shorts: Plenipotentiary Representative of the Republic of Abkhazia in Bulgaria and the Balkan countries Omer Marchand congratulated Daur Kove on his appointment as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: The Head of the Caucasus-Abkhazia Solidarity Committee Erdeshan Kobash Bganba sent a congratulatory note to the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Daur Kove
News_Shorts: The note reads, in particular:

News_Titles: Deputy of the State Duma I.K. Sukharev congratulated Daur Kove on his appointment as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia
News_Shorts: Deputy of the State Duma I.K. Sukharev congratulated Daur Kove on his appointment as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: Chairman of the Federation of Abkhazian cultural centers Ahmet Ceylan Hapat congratulated Daur Kove on his appointment as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia.
News_Shorts: Chairman of the Federation of Abkhazian cultural centers Ahmet Ceylan Hapat congratulated Daur Kove on his appointment as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov congratulated Daur Kove on his appointment as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia
News_Shorts: The Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation Sergey Lavrov congratulated Daur Kove on his appointment as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: Acting Minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPR Natalia Nikonorova congratulated Daur Kove on his appointment as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia.
News_Shorts: Acting Minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPR Natalia Nikonorova congratulated Daur Kove on his appointment as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: Head of the Official Representation of the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic in the Republic of Abkhazia Garry Kupalba congratulated Daur Kove on his appointment as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia
News_Shorts: Head of the Official Representation of the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic in the Republic of Abkhazia Garry Kupalba sent a congratulatory note to D.V. Kove in connection with his appointment to the post of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: The representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation in Nizhny Novgorod S.G. Malov sent a congratulatory note to D.V. Kove in connection with his appointment to the post of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkh

News_Shorts: Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation to the Republic of Abkhazia Semyon Grigoriev sent a congratulatory note to D.V. Kove in connection with his appointment to the post of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia.
